results.title: The First Study Evaluating the Safety of Pre-Surgery Administration of Metformin in Patients with Colorectal and other Gastrointestinal Cancers and Effect on Cancer Stem Cells.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: A total of 10 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (4 Male; 6 Female) received @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Grade 3 AEs included @DISEASE_Anemia @DISEASE_MESH:D000740 @@@anemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hypoalbuminemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D034141 @@@hypoalbuminemia@@@, alanine aminotransferase elevation, @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ and @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@ but none of these were related to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Saif MW, Rajagopal S, Caplain J, Goodman MD, Popowich D, Orkin BA, Tsichlis PN, Martell R. The First Study Evaluating the Safety of Pre-Surgery Administration of Metformin in Patients with Colorectal and other Gastrointestinal Cancers and Effect on Cancer Stem Cells. Cancer Med J. 2021 Sep;4(Suppl 4):1-10. PMID: 34368808

results.title: A Disease-Modifying Approach for Advanced Hidradenitis Suppurativa (Regimen with Metformin, Liraglutide, Dapsone, and Finasteride): A Case Report
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is an anti-@DISEASE_Hyperglycemic_Hyperosmolar_Nonketotic_Coma @DISEASE_MESH:D006944 @@@hyperglycemic@@@ agent that promotes @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity.

results.title: RECURRENT IMPETIGO HERPETIFORMIS WITH DIABETES AND HYPOALBUMINEMIA SUCCESSFULLY TREATED WITH CYCLOSPORINE, ALBUMIN, INSULIN AND METFORMIN
results.text_hl: Correction of associated @<m>DISEASE_Hypoalbuminemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D034141 @@@hypoalbuminemia@@@ hastened the resolution of lesions.
